description:
Contestants in Beast Games: Season 2 are divided into two teams: Strong and Smart. This market will resolve according to the name of the team to which the winning contestant belongs.

This market will resolve to "Strong" if the contestant who is announced as the winner of Beast Games: Season 2 belongs to the Strong team. If the contestant who is announced as the winner of Beast Games: Season 2 belongs to the Smart team, this market will resolve to "Smart".

The winner is defined as the contestant who is announced as the winner. If multiple players are announced as the winner, this market will resolve according to the contestant who wins the most prize money in the final episode. If multiple players tie for most prize money this money will resolve according to the team of the winning contestant whose last name comes first in alphabetical order. 

If no winner is announced by March 31, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50. 

The primary resolution source will be the final episode of the Beast Games, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

markets.question: Will the winner of Beast Games: Season 2 be Strong or Smart?
